languages.text: {n}Дознаватель чуть кривит рот.{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор счел, что мое присутствие на вашем судне и в вашей свите будет значительно полезнее в деле борьбы с ересью и злом, чем мое возвращение к наставнику. Наше прощание перед прибытием на Футфол было преждевременным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель чуть кривит рот.{/n} "Лорд Инквизитор счел, что мое присутствие на вашем судне и в вашей свите будет значительно полезнее в деле борьбы с ересью и злом, чем мое возвращение к наставнику. Наше прощание перед прибытием на Футфол было преждевременным".

languages.text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель чуть кривит рот.{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор счел, что мое присутствие на вашем судне и в вашей свите будет значительно полезнее в деле борьбы с ересью и злом, чем мое возвращение к наставнику. Наше прощание перед прибытием на Футфол было преждевременным".

traits.locale_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "Lord Inquisitor has found that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

{n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "Lord Inquisitor has found that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

{n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

{n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

{n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

languages.text: {n}彼の口がかすかに歪む。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターは、我があなたの船に乗り、あなたの従者として共に活動することは異端との戦いにおいて、我がメンターの側にいるよりも遥かに有益であると判断された。フットフォールに到着する前に別れたのは時期尚早だった」
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の口がかすかに歪む。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターは、我があなたの船に乗り、あなたの従者として共に活動することは異端との戦いにおいて、我がメンターの側にいるよりも遥かに有益であると判断された。フットフォールに到着する前に別れたのは時期尚早だった」

languages.text: {n}海因里希微微地撇着嘴。{/n}“大审判官认为，比起让我回到我的导师身边，让我以随行人员的身份登上你的船，更有助于对抗异端与邪恶势力。我们之前还没有抵达落脚港就匆匆分开，实在是为时过早。”
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希微微地撇着嘴。{/n}“审判长认为，比起让我回到我的导师身边，让我以随行人员的身份登上你的船，更有助于对抗异端与邪恶势力。我们之前还没有抵达落脚港就匆匆分开，实在是为时过早。”

languages.text: {n}Tuerce la boca ligeramente.{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor ha determinado que mi presencia a bordo de su nave y en su séquito resultaría más beneficiosa para la lucha contra la herejía y el mal que mi regreso con mi mentor. Nuestra separación antes de llegar a Paso fue prematura».
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuerce la boca ligeramente.{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor ha determinado que mi presencia a bordo de su nave y en su séquito resultaría más beneficiosa para la lucha contra la herejía y el mal que mi regreso con mi mentor. Nuestra separación antes de llegar a Paso fue prematura».

languages.text: {n}Ses lèvres se tordent très légèrement.{/n} « Le seigneur inquisiteur a estimé que ma présence à bord de votre vaisseau et dans votre entourage serait bien plus bénéfique au combat contre l'hérésie et le mal, plutôt que de me laisser retrouver ma place aux côtés de mon mentor. Mon départ avant notre arrivée à Castel aura été prématuré. »
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses lèvres se tordent très légèrement.{/n} « Le seigneur inquisiteur a estimé que ma présence à bord de votre vaisseau et dans votre entourage serait bien plus bénéfique au combat contre l'hérésie et le mal, plutôt que de me laisser retrouver ma place aux côtés de mon mentor. Mon départ avant notre arrivée à Castel aura été prématuré. »

languages.text: {n}Sein Mund verzieht sich leicht.{/n} "Der Großinquisitor hält meine Anwesenheit an Bord Eures Schiffs und in Eurem Gefolge für deutlich sinnvoller für den Kampf gegen Ketzerei und das Böse als meine Rückkehr zu meinem Mentor. Unsere Trennung vor Eurer Ankunft auf Footfall war voreilig."
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Mund verzieht sich leicht.{/n} "Der Großinquisitor hält meine Anwesenheit an Bord Eures Schiffs und in Eurem Gefolge für deutlich sinnvoller für den Kampf gegen Ketzerei und das Böse als meine Rückkehr zu meinem Mentor. Unsere Trennung vor Eurer Ankunft auf Footfall war voreilig."

languages.text: {n}Hafifçe dudaklarını büküyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, yönderimin yanına dönmektense geminde ve maiyetinde bulunmamın kâfirliğe ve kötülüğe karşı savaşta çok daha faydalı olacağını buyurdular. Binliman'a dönmeden önce ayrılmamızı erken bulmuşlar."
languages.original_text: {n}His mouth twists slightly.{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor has deemed that my presence aboard your ship and in your retinue would be significantly more beneficial to the fight against heresy and evil than my return to my mentor's side. Our parting before our arrival on Footfall was premature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hafifçe dudaklarını büküyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, mentorumun yanına dönmektense geminde ve maiyetinde bulunmamın kâfirliğe ve kötülüğe karşı savaşta çok daha faydalı olacağını buyurdular. Binliman'a dönmeden önce ayrılmamızı erken bulmuşlar."
